html.p: The Zero Install system aims to provide a better way of installing software than traditional systems (tarballs, apt-get, bundles, setup.exe, etc). Here are some of our goals:

td.p: You don't have to be the administrator (root) just to install a word-processor [ more ]

You don't need to be blessed by a distribution (or anyone else) to be part of Zero Install;
The system is completely decentralised [ more ]

td.h3: It doesn't matter whether software is installed or not
td.p: You just run it. Zero Install handles the rest (downloading and caching as needed) [ more ]
